ModMetaData.name: Alpha Memes
ModMetaData.author: Sarg Bjornson, Helixien, Cassie, Luizi, Allie
ModMetaData.description:
Adds new memes and structures to Rimworld.
<size=24>Features</size>
- Adds 13 new structures: Alienism, Jewish origins, Kemetic origins, Steampunk revival, Jain origins, Sikh origins, Corsair, Neolithic, Scavenger and Atheism. With Anomaly you get Cubicism, Flesh cult and Void-Touched - Adds 11 new memes: Vow of Nonviolence, Artist, Sadist, Youth, Madness, Biological corruptors, Biological defilers, Biological reconstructors, Psychic vampirism (needs Royalty), Gauranlen supremacy, Bulwark, Sharpshooter, Gladiator, Iconoclast, Monastic and Prefab preference. - Greatly expands all vanilla Ideology styles (Techist, Morbid, etc) with more than 500 individual styled weapons, buildings, etc
<size=24>Credits</size>
Corsair ritual song by Justin Marshall Elias: https://www.justinmarshallelias.com/ https://www.imdb.com/name/nm3365402/?ref_=fn_al_nm_1 https://www.instagram.com/justinmarshallelias/?hl=en
Neolithic ritual sound by franknflute: https://freesound.org/people/franeknflute/sounds/200419/
Scavenger ritual sound by Nuklean: https://www.looperman.com/loops/detail/302417/juice-wrld-type-drums-trap-with-fire-808-free-184bpm-trap-drum-loop
Tea ceremony sound by JalynCatbtg: https://freesound.org/people/JalynCatbtg/sounds/643379/
<size=24>Changelog</size>
Full changelog on GitHub
